com.comp2042.tetris.view

Packages that use com.comp2042.tetris.view
Package

com.comp2042.tetris.controller.ui
 
com.comp2042.tetris.view
 
  • Classes in com.comp2042.tetris.view used by com.comp2042.tetris.controller.ui
    Class
    Description
    BoardRenderer
    Renders the Tetris game board and brick displays using JavaFX.
    GameViewPresenter
     
    OverlayPanel
     
    VisualEffectsManager
    VisualEffectsManager manages all visual effects in the game including: - Nebula clouds (background cosmic effects) - Pixel stars (twinkling starfield) - Shooting stars (animated streaks across screen) - Flicker effects (screen flickering for Level 3) - Intro sequence animations This class centralizes visual effect logic that was previously scattered across GuiController, making the controller more focused on coordination.
  • Classes in com.comp2042.tetris.view used by com.comp2042.tetris.view
    Class
    Description
    BoardRenderer
    Renders the Tetris game board and brick displays using JavaFX.
    FireworkAnimator
    More dramatic firework animator: larger particle counts, further spread, longer durations, expanding ring, and a small secondary sparkle burst.
    NebulaCloudAnimator
    NebulaCloudAnimator creates and animates colorful nebula gas clouds.
    NotificationAnimator
     
    OverlayPanel
     
    PixelStarAnimator
    PixelStarAnimator creates and animates small twinkling pixel stars across the screen.
    PixelStarExplosion
    Creates and animates a pixel star explosion effect.
    RowClearAnimator
    Handles row clearing animations for the Tetris game.
    ShootingStarAnimator
    ShootingStarAnimator creates and animates shooting star effects across the game screen.
